Question
========
Where do you browse and install Positron extensions?

Answerlist
----------
* In the Extensions view from the Activity Bar (four-square icon)
* From the Terminal by running `install.extensions()`
* By editing the settings JSON file manually
* From the Quarto preview pane

Solution
========
Open the Extensions sidebar via the four-square icon on the left to browse, install, and update extensions.
